bio.summary: This is a Creedence clearwater revival tribute band. The members are Peter Barton and Johnnie Guitar Williamson (The Animals), Chris Allen (Current Troggs, ex Lieutenant Pigeon / Denny Laine Band / The Animals/ Silson Spencer Hawkes Band ), and Wally Day ( ex- Lipstick / New Amen Corner ). They bring a high quality tribute to CCR. Read more on Last.fm
